text: Christopher Scott "Chris" Murphy (born August 3, 1973) is the junior United States Senator from Connecticut. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He previously served in the United States House of Representatives, representing from 2007 to 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== *U.S. Senator Chris Murphy, official U.S. Senate site *Chris Murphy for Senate * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:United States representatives from Connecticut Category:United States senators from Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Chris Murphy
